questions.question: 1) What is the total time required for a 10-bit ADC conversion if the minimum TAD is 0.7 microsecond?
2) In the ADC module of a PIC microcontroller, what does the ADFM bit in the ADCON2 register control?
3) Which of the following statements about ADC acquisition time (TACQ) is correct?

answers.a: TACQ is calculated as TAMP + TC + TCOFF
answers.c: TACQ is always a fixed value for all ADCs
answers.d: TACQ does not affect ADC accuracy

questions.question: 4) In the ADC module, which register stores the high and low byte of the converted digital result?
5) Which step is NOT required in the ADC conversion process?

answers.c: Set the GO/DONE bit to start conversion
answers.d: Manually shift bits to align the result
